sentences.sContent: There are new tractors and new ploughs in the machinery lot.
sentences.sCn: 机器设备场里有新拖拉机和新耕犁。

sentences.sContent: In those days the land was plowed by oxen.
sentences.sCn: 在那个年代是用公牛来犁地的。

trans.tranOther: a piece of farm equipment used to turn over the earth so that seeds can be planted
to turn over the earth using a plough so that seeds can be planted
